titleStmt.title: An Electronic Edition Mishnah Bava Metsia, S08010
titleStmt.sponsor: Joseph and Rebecca Meyerhoff Center for Jewish Studies
Lieberman Institute; Primary Witnesses to Tannaitic Literature

publicationStmt.pubPlace: The Maryland Institute for Technology in the Humanities

availability.p: This work is copyright Hayim lapin and the Joseph and Rebecca Meyerhoff Center for Jewish Studies and licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution International 4.0 License.

note.p: Mishnah text, extracted from the Leiden manuscript of the Palestian Talmud, MS Leiden Or. 4720, as published in Schäfer, et al., Synopsis, Vol IV.

Based on a transcription by Kerstin Ipta, Gerold Necker, Martina Urban und Gert Wildensee, last revision by Hans-Jürgen Becker. Responsibility by Peter Schäfer, Hans-Jürgen Becker. Converted to TEI by Gottfried Reeg using TUSCRIPT

layout.note: Layout requires autopsy and discussion, since the Yerushalmi is squeezed into the margins of the text of the Bavli.
